name: paunchiness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of having a fat stomach, especially on a man: He is worried about his increasing paunchiness. His paunchiness was exaggerated by an old, dark suit that was too small for him. See
paunch
More examplesFewer examplesHis sweater gave an impression of paunchiness.She was a middle-aged female with a slight paunchiness that comes with age.The country is slowly heading towards paunchiness.
